t: Hilton Honors members go shopping with points on Amazon - RetailWire
s: May 23, 2024 - If you’re one of the 66 million members of the Hilton Honors rewards program, you are now eligible to redeem your points for purchases on Amazon.com. With its announcement made earlier this week, Hilton becomes the first hotel brand to link its loyalty program point redemption to the e-tail site.

t: Hilton teams up with Amazon in loyalty program strategy | Retail Customer Experience

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
